topic.title: Advance Directives Section (entries optional) (V3) - conformance rules

section.p: Known Subclasses: Advance Directives Section (entries required) (V3), Advance Directives Section (entries optional) (V4)

This section contains data defining the patient's advance directives and any reference to supporting documentation, including living wills, healthcare proxies, and CPR and resuscitation status. If the referenced documents are available, they can be included in the exchange package.
The most recent directives are required, if known, and should be listed in as much detail as possible.
This section differentiates between "advance directives" and "advance directive documents". The former is the directions to be followed whereas the latter refers to a legal document containing those directions.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7928, CONF:1198-10376, CONF:1198-15340 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Advance Directives Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15340)/@code="42348-3" Advance Directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15342, CONF:1198-30812)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7957, CONF:1198-15443)
Conforms to Advance Directive Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-32891, CONF:1198-32892)
Conforms to Advance Directive Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.108:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Advance Directives Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15340)/@code="42348-3" Advance Directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15342, CONF:1198-30812)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7930, R2.1=CONF:1198-7930)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7931, R2.1=CONF:1198-7931)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7957, CONF:1198-15443)
Conforms to Advance Directive Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-32891, CONF:1198-32892)
Conforms to Advance Directive Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.108:2015-08-01)

living will"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <component> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> </author> <participant> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.58"/> </participant> <participant/> <reference typeCode="REFR"/> </observation> </component> </organizer> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <participant> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.58"/> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <participantRole> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.101" codeSystemName="NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy"/> </participantRole> </participant> <participant> <participantRole> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> </participantRole> </participant> <reference typeCode="REFR"> <externalDocument/> </reference> </observation> </entry> </section>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7928, CONF:10376 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21"
Consol Advance Directives Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15340)/@code="42348-3" Advance Directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15342)
Consol Advance Directives Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7930, R2.1=CONF:1198-7930)
Consol Advance Directives Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7931, R2.1=CONF:1198-7931)

Consol Advance Directives Section Entries Optional If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7957, CONF:8800) Conforms to Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48)
